creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three panel huipil, round-cut neck opening with applied lace; lace at arm openings; ribbon rosettes applied to front, back and both shoulders; white ground cloth with supplementary weft patterning in yellow and purple covering upper half of garment; design consists of highly stylized forms, plant forms, rayed diamonds and others; lower half of garment patterned in whtite on white in diamond/trellis pattern.
medium: Cotton, rayon; supplementary weft patterning, appliqu√©
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
